Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Yeah... my guess is that you were sending so many txs that depend on each other, that they couldnt enter the mempool on other nodes.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Ive seen that happen plenty of times

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: they cant all arrive in the exact right order... hence mempool deny spam.
